DOC.brief_summary: This study compare insulin lispro protamine suspension ( ILPS ) insulin glargine combination patient 's oral diabetes medication exenatide , ability control blood sugar patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Basal Insulins Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Taking Oral Diabetes Medicines Exenatide
DOC.criteria: Must type 2 diabetes Must least 18 year age less 75 year age Must take exenatide 10 microgram twice day ( BID ) least 3 month Must take one follow oral diabetes medication regimens least 3 month : ( 1 ) metformin ( 2 ) metformin + sulfonylurea ( 3 ) metformin + thiazolidinedione ( TZD ) . Doses must follow : Metformin1500 mg/day , Sulfonylurea1/2 maximum daily dose accord product label , TZD30 mg/day pioglitazone Must hemoglobin A1C great equal 7.0 % less equal 10.0 % Must use insulin regular basis past 2 year Must take glucoselowering medication include inclusion criterion past 3 month Must one episode severe hypoglycemia past 6 month Must clinically significant hematologic , oncologic , renal , cardiac , hepatic , gastrointestinal disease Must pregnant intend get pregnant course study
